title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. A view that is maximized should stay maximized.
OB: The CVS repository view should stay maximized when switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized. It should stay maximized when switching perspectives.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
